theTourist:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theTourist:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theTourist:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theTourist:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theTourist:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theTourist:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theTourist:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theTourist:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theTourist:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theTourist:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theTourist:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theTourist:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theTourist:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
